overview:
Since my childhood, I am an explorer very curious about the world around me. I was lucky to live in many places in France and mostly in Font Romeu and Languedoc Roussillon.

I discover photography in Roma in 1988 but had to stopped. I start again photography while in university after 1995. Exploring France during this period I became more and more an explorer who need adventure and surprises.

Visit MaltaAfter a while in Amiens and Paris, I settled in the great Duchy of Luxembourg. Internet wave arrived and also the digital photography so I was able to train more and more to the photography. I went to a lot of concert with my camera and I started exploring the social media.

On the other side I was a pionner of the Internet where I started my carreer in 1998 in various banking or institutionnal institution. I have also created my web agency which may help you for your website and your communication : Sophia Services
